Name: Burn In
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies the number of preliminary MCMC steps before samples are being drawn. This may reduce effects from improper initialization.

Name: Leap
Configuration Settings.Description: Generates a Markov Chain containing samples from every 'Leap'-th step. This will increase the overall Chain Length by a factor of 'Leap'.

Name: Rejection Levels
Configuration Settings.Description: Controls the number of accept-reject stages per MCMC step (by default, this value is set 1, for values greater 1 the delajed rejection algorithm is active.

Name: Use Adaptive Sampling
Configuration Settings.Description: Specifies if covariance matrix of the proposal distribution is calculated from the samples.

Name: Non Adaption Period
Configuration Settings.Description: Number of steps (after Burn In steps) during which the initial covariance is used instead of the Chain Covariance. If 0 (default) is specified, this value is calibrated as $5%$ of the Max Chain Length (only relevant for Adaptive Sampling).

Name: Chain Covariance Scaling
Configuration Settings.Description: Learning rate of the Chain Covariance (only relevant for Adaptive Sampling).

Name: Initial Mean
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the Initial Mean of the proposal distribution.

Name: Initial Standard Deviation
Variables Configuration.Description: Specifies the Standard Deviation for each variable. The proposal distribution is defined through a covariance matrix with the variance of the variables in its diagonal.

Name: Cholesky Decomposition Covariance
Internal Settings.Description: Cholesky Decomposition of Covariance for sampling (using a lower triangular matrix, with rest zeros).

Name: Cholesky Decomposition Chain Covariance
Internal Settings.Description: Chain Cholesky Decomposition of Covariance for sampling (using a lower triangular matrix, with rest zeros).

Name: Chain Leader
Internal Settings.Description: Variables of the newest sample in the Markov chain.

Name: Chain Leader Evaluation
Internal Settings.Description: The logLikelihood of the newest sample in the Markov chain.

Name: Chain Candidate
Internal Settings.Description: Candidate variables to be accepted or rejected after comparison with the Chain Leader.

Name: Chain Candidates Evaluations
Internal Settings.Description: The loglikelihoods of the Chain Candidate Parameters.

Name: Rejection Alphas
Internal Settings.Description: Placeholder for recursive calculation of delayed rejection schemes.

Name: Acceptance Rate
Internal Settings.Description: Ratio proposed to accepted samples (including Burn In period).

Name: Acceptance Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of accepted samples (including Burn In period).

Name: Database Entry Count
Internal Settings.Description: Number of samples stored in the database after Burn In steps.

Name: Sample Database
Internal Settings.Description: Parameters generated by MCMC and stored in the database.

Name: Sample Evaluation Database
Internal Settings.Description: Evaluation associated with the parameters stored in the database.

Name: Chain Mean
Internal Settings.Description: Mean of Markov Chain calculated from samples in Database.

Name: Chain Covariance
Internal Settings.Description: Chain Covariance calculated from samples in Database.

Name: Chain Length
Internal Settings.Description: Current Chain Length (including Burn In and Leaped Samples).
